Phoenix and Puzzletime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputPhoenix is playing with a new puzzle, which consists of $$$n$$$ identical puzzle pieces. processed.result:
You are given a number  $n$.  Determine if it is possible to arrange $n$ right isosceles triangles to form a square without any gaps or overlaps. 

If it is possible, output "YES". Otherwise, output "NO".
Given a number of identical triangular pieces, can you arrange them to form a perfect square?
